department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Purchase environmental test chamber for the Canadian Forest Service
description: NP is soliciting proposals for purchase of an environmental test chamber for the Canadian Forest Service located in QUEBEC, QC, CANADA. The Contract ID is
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement #### Tender Details **Reference Number**: `WS3773783932-Doc3843800915` **Solicitation Number**: `WS3773783932` **Tender Status**: Expired - Please note that the tender closing date has passed and only unsuccessful tenderers will be notified. **Estimated Total Contract Value**: None **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (Government of Canada) **Solicited By**: National Research Council Canada (NRCC) **End User Entity**: Department of Natural Resources (DN) #### Tender Overview The National Research Council of Canada (NRCC) is soliciting a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of an environmental test chamber for the Canadian Forest Service in Quebec, Canada. #### Essential Tender Documents *Tender Closing Date*: February 20th, 2023 (14:00 HNE) *Tender Submission Requirements*: All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received no later than 14:00 HNE on February 20th, 2023. *Bid Evaluation Criteria*: The lowest price will be the primary factor for bid evaluation. #### Contract Terms *Closing Date for Bid Evaluation*: Following the closing date for bid submissions, only the successful bidders will be contacted. *Contract Start Date*: Not Applicable - Tender not active. *Contract End Date*: June 30th, 2023 #### Key Contact Information **Contact Name**: Felix-Antoine Carignan (SPAC/PSPC) **Email**: felix-antoine.carignan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca **Phone Number**: Not available - all contact should be made via the provided email. Please ensure all correspondence, including bid submissions, are addressed to the contracting entity for the relevant tender details. For all queries, please contact Felix-Antoine Carignan at the email address above. ([felix-antoine.carignan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:felix-antoine.carignan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)). For detailed tender information, please click on the "Tender URL" link below. [tender PDF](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15228093?extsite=MTUyMjgwOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
If you require further information, kindly use the following link for further resources.
